src:
Death Penalty
06 Nov 2019, 17:31 by BRIEF
AUSTIN, Texas – The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals on Wednesday changed the death sentence of a convicted murderer to life in prison based on the finding that he is intellectual disabled.
